excerpt: 33m-tall monument of Jesus Christ colorfully lit at night & shining a spotlight on the city.
detail_description: Cristo Luz is a 33-meter-tall monument located in Balneario Camboriu, resembling the Christ the Redeemer statue in Rio de Janeiro but with unique features such as Jesus wearing a broad-brimmed hat. At night, the statue is illuminated with colorful lights that change periodically, casting a spotlight on the city.
name: Cristo Luz
address: R. Indonésia, 800 - Nações, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-000, Brazil

excerpt: Cable cars lead visitors around this forested adventure park with viewpoints, zip lines & rides.
detail_description: Parque Unipraias is a popular tourist destination in Balneario Camboriu, offering over 85,000 square meters of natural attractions and activities for visitors of all ages. The park features a unique cable car system that connects two beaches and provides panoramic views of the city and coastline from over 3,000 meters high. In addition to walking trails through the urban reserve, visitors can enjoy thrilling amusements such as the Yoohooo!
name: Parque Unipraias
address: Av. Atlântica, 6006 - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-908, Brazil

excerpt: Adventure sports like paragliding are popular at this beach-adjacent hill with a snack bar.
detail_description: Complexo Turístico do Morro do Careca is a perfect outdoor destination with a peak 104 meters above sea level. Visitors can reach the summit by hiking or driving and enjoy stunning views of the city from the top. The main attractions include paragliding, breathtaking landscapes of the Atlantic Ocean and Praia Brava, as well as a snack bar offering refreshing ACAI fruit.
name: Complexo Turístico do Morro do Careca
address: Cume do Morro do Careca, R. Gregório de Matos, S/N - Praia dos Amores, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88331-475, Brazil

detail_description: Barra Sul is a must-visit destination offering breathtaking views of the city. You can hop on the teleferico at Barra Sul pier and ascend to Parque Unipraias, a sprawling six-hectare nature reserve with scenic hiking trails and an exhilarating 750-meter-high zip line. Additionally, in Balneario Camboriu, you'll find Beto Carrero World, the largest theme park in Latin America, promising endless fun and excitement for visitors of all ages.
name: Barra Sul
address: Balneário Camboriú - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Balneário Camboriú is a coastal city in the southern Brazilian state of Santa Catarina. The city is built on steep hills which drop down to the sea. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Balneário Camboriú is a stunning beach resort city in Brazil, known for its beautiful sandy beaches and vibrant atmosphere. The city offers a range of water sports and activities, making it a popular destination for adventure seekers. With its modern skyline and lively nightlife, Balneário Camboriú has a cosmopolitan feel while still maintaining its coastal charm. Visitors can enjoy delicious seafood at the waterfront restaurants or take a cable car ride for panoramic views of the coastline.
name: Balneário Camboriú
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Long strip of seashore offering chair & umbrella rentals, plus city views & access to eateries.
detail_description: Central Beach, also known as the principal postcard of Balneario Camboriu, is a bustling 6.8 km stretch of seashore that offers chair and umbrella rentals along with stunning city views and access to various eateries. Recently expanded, the beach now boasts a wider sandy area and overlooks the illuminated Ilha das Cabras at night.
name: Central Beach
address: Av. Atlântica - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-000, Brazil

excerpt: Large, modern aquarium featuring over 100 species living in a variety of underwater habitats.
detail_description: Oceanic Aquarium is a large and modern facility that aims to protect and preserve over 100 species of marine life. Visitors have the opportunity to observe a diverse array of animals, including sharks, seahorses, octopuses, clownfish, penguins, alligators, otters, anacondas, and stingrays. While some visitors feel that certain tanks are too small for the inhabitants, many appreciate the charming bird area and find the otters particularly delightful.
name: Oceanic Aquarium
address: R. 4000, 133 - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-180, Brazil

detail_description: Praia Central, the primary beach in Balneario Camboriu, is a key draw for tourists visiting Santa Catarina. Extending 6 km along the Atlantic Ocean, this beach allures visitors throughout the year with its inviting soft golden sands and clear waters. Praia Central also offers top-notch amenities for various water sports activities, making it a popular destination for beach enthusiasts.
name: Praia central
address: Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-388, Brazil

detail_description: Deck do Pontal Norte is a 500-meter-long wooden deck featuring illuminated walkways, observation decks, and platforms above the sea. It offers access to sandy beaches and highlights the environmental quality of the Barra Norte area, surrounded by the Atlantic forest, rocks, and the sea. Visitors can enjoy a wonderful view of Balneario Camboriu's seafront and access Buraco Beach.
name: Deck do Pontal Norte
address: Av. Atlântica - Pioneiros, Balneário Camboriú - SC, Brazil

excerpt: Busy, clear-water beach with swimming & water sports access, plus nearby restaurants & a pier.
detail_description: Praia das Laranjeiras is a popular beach in Balneario Camboriu, offering clear waters and a range of water sports activities. The area boasts nearby restaurants and a pier, making it convenient for visitors to enjoy the beach and its surroundings. Accessible via the thrilling cable ride from Uniprais Park, this crescent-shaped paradise provides a tranquil setting for sunbathing and swimming.
name: Praia das Laranjeiras
address: Praia de Laranjeiras, State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: City zoological park housing a diverse array of species, from mammals to reptiles to birds.
detail_description: Complexo Ambiental Cyro Gevaerd is a popular destination for families and animal lovers, offering a high standard of care for its diverse range of friendly animals including mammals, birds, reptiles, and fishes. Visitors can also enjoy the Mini-Farm with cattle, horses, and poultry. Additionally, the park offers helicopter rides and a visit to Cyro Gevaerd Park where you can explore typical Santa Catarina vegetation and fauna as well as reconstructions of old colonial houses.
name: Complexo Ambiental Cyro Gevaerd
address: BR-101, km 137 - Nova Esperança, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88332-510, Brazil

excerpt: Lengthy jetty & pedestrian walkway featuring scenic views of the sea & city skyscrapers.
detail_description: Molhe da Barra Sul is a lengthy jetty and pedestrian walkway that extends over 450 meters into the sea, offering stunning views of the city skyline and the ocean. Located near the central beach, it's a popular spot for locals and tourists to take photos and enjoy a romantic evening stroll along the lit pathway. This breakwater not only serves its functional purpose but has also become a tourist attraction, drawing visitors who want to capture its beauty in photographs.
name: Molhe da Barra Sul
address: Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88337-260, Brazil

excerpt: This modest, sandy beach is surrounded by green hills & offers swimming & sunbathing.
detail_description: Praia do Pinho is a modest sandy beach surrounded by green hills, offering visitors the perfect spot for swimming and sunbathing. It is part of a group of ten easily accessible beaches, six of which are connected by the Interpraias Highway. Praia do Pinho stands out as Brazil's first official nudist beach, nestled among cliffs and accessed through private property with a parking fee.
name: Praia do Pinho
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Spacious retail center with a refined vibe offering diverse stores, a food court & a movie theater.
detail_description: Balneario Shopping Mall is a spacious retail center located just five minutes from downtown, offering a refined atmosphere and diverse amenities. With 26 stores spread across two floors and over 43,500 square meters of leasable area, it provides a wide range of shopping options. The mall also features more than 47 dining choices, an eight-screen movie theater, and ample parking with 1,300 spaces. Visitors can enjoy popular restaurants in the food court and stay entertained with the latest movies.
name: Balneario Shopping Mall
address: Av. Santa Catarina, 1 - Estados, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88339-005, Brazil

name: Green Valley
address: R. Antônio Lopes Gonçalves Bastos, 1083 - Bairro Rio Pequeno, Camboriú - SC, 88343-412, Brazil

detail_description: The Classic Car Show Museu do Automóvel in Balneário Camboriú is a must-visit for car enthusiasts and anyone with an appreciation for vintage vehicles. With over 30 incredible cars on display, including iconic brands like Rolls-Royce, Ford, Cadillac, Mustang, Jaguar, Ferrari, Buick, BMW, and more, this museum offers a trip back in time. The well-maintained state of the cars allows visitors to admire them up close.
name: Classic Car Show
address: Av. Normando Tedesco, 5720 - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-036, Brazil

detail_description: Morro do Careca is a hilltop viewpoint offering breathtaking panoramic views of Balneario Camboriu seafront, Laranjeiras Beach, Buraco Beach, Amores Beach, Brava Beach and Itajai. The area boasts pristine Atlantic forest, hiking trails, and a take-off area for adventure sports. Accessible via a paved road with parking available, it provides a 360-degree perspective of the surroundings.
name: Morro do Careca Voos de Parapente
address: R. Gregório de Matos, 229 - Praia dos Amores, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88331-475, Brazil

detail_description: Unipraias Park - Orange Station is a welcoming beach destination with great dining options and a variety of water sports activities to enjoy. It's highly recommended for those seeking a fun and active day by the sea.
name: Unipraias Park - Orange Station
address: Av. Rodesindo Pavan, 435-577 - larangeiras, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88332-245, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante Praia Brava Mundo Selvagem Garden is a charming café and bistro that offers a delightful array of culinary options, making it an ideal spot for any meal of the day. Whether you're in the mood for a cozy coffee break, a light snack, lunch, or dinner, this restaurant has you covered. Nestled right by the beach and surrounded by beautiful gardens, it provides not only delicious food but also a picturesque setting to enjoy your dining experience.
name: Restaurante Praia Brava Mundo Selvagem Garden
address: Avenida Ruy Barbosa, n°207F, Fundos - Praia dos Amores, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88331-510, Brazil

name: Teleférico - Estação Mata Atlântica
address: Unnamed Road, Barra, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88332, Brazil

detail_description: The Barra Sul Station Cable Car is a highlight of the 9-hour Balneario Camboriu and Unipraias Park Tour, offering an exhilarating ride that allows you to soar above the stunning cityscape. As you glide through the air, you'll have the chance to explore vibrant Atlantic Avenue and immerse yourself in local culture at Camboriu Spa.
name: Barra Sul Station Cable Car
address: Molhe da Barra Sul - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, Brazil

excerpt: Serene, secluded beach with turbulent water, popular for walks, picnics & photography.
detail_description: Nestled among a series of interconnected beaches, Praia de Taquarinhas stands out as a serene and secluded coastal gem. While the nearby urbanized Praia Central boasts skyscrapers and bustling tourist attractions, Taquarinhas offers a rural and natural atmosphere, making it an ideal escape from the crowds. This pristine beach is perfect for leisurely walks, picnics, and photography, providing visitors with an opportunity to connect with nature and unwind in its tranquil surroundings.
name: Praia de Taquarinhas
address: Praia de Laranjeiras, State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Low-key, tranquil sandy beach featuring a few casual bars & restaurants nearby.
detail_description: Taquaras Beach is a low-key and tranquil sandy beach in Balneario Camboriu, featuring a few casual bars and restaurants nearby. It is one of the ten different beaches easily accessible in the area, with six connected by the Interpraias Highway. The beach offers a beautiful but aggressive sea on a coast that descends abruptly, making it suitable for experienced bathers seeking to escape the hustle and bustle of busier beaches.
name: Taquaras Beach
address: Taquara, Balneário Camboriú - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: According to a survey conducted by Camboriu News, some places in Camboriú have restrictions on the size and weight of pets, as well as additional fees for pet stays.
name: Camboriú
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Visitors set sail on this large pirate ship with scenic views & a costumed crew performing a show.
detail_description: Set sail on the Barco Pirata in Balneário Camboriú for an unforgettable adventure, regardless of the season! This impressive pirate ship offers stunning views as it navigates from Barra Sul, around Central Beach and Ilha das Cabras, before heading to Laranjeiras Beach. Families will love the lively performances by a costumed crew that bring the pirate theme to life.
name: Barco Pirata - Balneário Camboriú
address: Av. Normando Tedesco, 6020 - Barra Sul, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-120, Brazil

excerpt: Oceanside Ferris wheel offering rides with panoramas over a beach backed by skyscraper hotels.
detail_description: The ferris wheel at Big Wheel Balneário Camboriú is a giant ride with a diameter of over 100 meters. It offers an unforgettable experience for visitors, who can enjoy breathtaking views of the city from up high.
name: Roda Gigante de Balneário Camboriú
address: Estr. da Raínha, 1009 - Pioneiros, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88331-510, Brazil

excerpt: Lively Praia Brava is known for its namesake beach, a hub for kite-surfing and jet-skiing that’s also popular with joggers thanks to its long promenade. The nearby streets are lined with shops selling swimsuits and water sports gear. After dark, trendy crowds gather in the seafood restaurants, snack bars, and gelaterias near the waterfront before moving on to cocktail bars and clubs playing electronic music.
detail_description: Praia Brava is a vibrant destination known for its lively beach, which attracts kite-surfers, jet-skiers, and joggers along its long promenade. The area is lined with shops selling swimsuits and water sports gear. As night falls, trendy crowds gather in seafood restaurants, snack bars, and gelaterias near the waterfront before moving on to cocktail bars and clubs playing electronic music.
name: Praia Brava
address: Itajaí - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Empresa Penha Balneário Camboriú is a prominent transportation service that connects travelers to the stunning coastal city of Balneário Camboriú. Known for its comfortable and reliable buses, this company offers an efficient way to explore the vibrant attractions and beautiful beaches of the region. With a focus on customer satisfaction, Empresa Penha ensures that passengers enjoy a smooth journey while taking in the scenic views along the route.
name: Empresa Penha Balneário Camboriú
address: Atendimento e Pedidos via WhatsApp - (44 - 99180-0463, Av. Santa Catarina, 347 - Estados, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88339-005, Brazil

detail_description: Passarela da Barra, also known as the Barra pedestrian bridge, is a 190-meter-long structure in Balneario Camboriu that stands as tall as a 22-story building. It provides exclusive access for pedestrians and cyclists, offering a privileged view of the waterfront and connecting different neighborhoods. Inaugurated in September 2016, it serves as a crossing over the Rio Camboriu.
name: Passarela da Barra
address: Av. Normando Tedesco, 1743 - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, Brazil

excerpt: Quiet Praia dos Amores extends along Praia do Buraco beach. Popular with surfers, this sandy stretch backed by lush vegetation is accessed via the North Pontal Deck boardwalk. The Morro do Careca hill offers forested trails, paragliding facilities, and a belvedere with far-reaching coastal views. Live music bars and restaurants serving seafood, pasta, and sushi are clustered around Avenida Carlos Drummond Andrade.
detail_description: Praia dos Amores is a serene beach located in Balneario Camboriu, popular among surfers and nature enthusiasts. The sandy shoreline is flanked by lush greenery and can be accessed via the North Pontal Deck boardwalk. For adventure seekers, Morro do Careca hill offers forested trails and paragliding facilities, along with a belvedere providing stunning coastal views.
name: Praia dos Amores
address: Balneário Camboriú - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Popular beach with rocks & hills, known for its luxury area amenities including resorts & day clubs.
detail_description: Praia do Estaleirinho is a popular beach known for its luxury amenities, including resorts and day clubs. It is part of a group of interconnected beaches along the Interpraias Highway, offering visitors the opportunity to spend the entire day exploring each one. With its clean sandy shores, clear waters, and frequent waves, it's a favorite spot for beach lovers. The area also features the famous Sky Beach club where parties are common.
name: Praia do Estaleirinho
address: Região das Praias, State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Parque dos Dinossauros - Aventura Jurássica - Atração Turística de Balneário Camboriú is a stunning and entertaining destination with plenty of green spaces, dining options, and activities for both kids and adults. The tour features interactive videos, life-sized replicas, and various attractions that make for an engaging experience lasting around two to three hours. Visitors can enjoy outdoor and indoor play areas for children as well as thrilling activities like ziplining.
name: Parque Aventura Jurássica
address: R. Aqueduto, 370 - Estados, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88339-090, Brazil

excerpt: This modest sandy beach features fishing, strong waves, city views & an adjacent resort.
detail_description: Hole Beach is a charming sandy shoreline that offers opportunities for angling, powerful surges, urban perspectives, and a nearby resort. This exquisite location is admired for its natural beauty and renowned as one of the finest coastal destinations. With its exceptional qualities and breathtaking surroundings, Hole Beach stands out as an idyllic spot to indulge in relaxation and enjoy the mesmerizing views of the cityscape. Additionally, this beach boasts a neighboring resort that provides additional amenities for visitors seeking a complete vacation experience.
name: Hole Beach
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

name: Passarela da Barra
address: Av. Normando Tedesco, 1743 - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, Brazil

excerpt: Set in a fishing village, this laid-back beach offers calm waters for swimming, fishmongers & bars.
name: Praia do Canto
address: Itapema - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: This small, sandy beach is used for sunbathing, swimming, snorkeling & diving, plus boating.
detail_description: The Prainha public beach, located next to Lagoinha, serves as a popular spot for sunbathing, swimming, snorkeling, and diving. It also serves as a departure point for boat tours and diving schools. Despite its small size of only 60 meters, the beach is an excellent choice for various water activities. If you are lucky, you may even catch sight of turtles and penguins at the nautical center.
name: Praia do Embrulho
address: Acesso pela, R. Garoupas, s/n - Centro, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: The ecological park Secretaria Meio Ambiente / Parque Ecológico Raimundo Gonçález Malta is a beautiful and well-preserved location, ideal for spending quality time with the family. The trails within the park are pleasant, making them a great choice for taking a leisurely stroll with your furry friend. This top-notch place provides an excellent opportunity to connect with nature and enjoy its serene landscapes.
name: Parque Ecológico Raimundo Gonçález Malta
address: Alameda Delfim de Pádua Peixoto Filho, G. Malta, 122 - Municípios, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88337-470, Brazil

detail_description: The Morro do Gavião hiking area is known for its impressive trail, which may be initially challenging but ultimately rewarding. Although some may find it tiring at first, it is definitely worth the effort. The trail offers a unique and surreal experience, with breathtaking views and a sense of adventure. It has gained a reputation as a top destination for hikers, attracting both locals and tourists alike.
name: Morro do Gavião
address: Estados, Balneário Camboriú - SC, Brazil

detail_description: MIS-BC - Museu da Imagem e do Som de Balneário Camboriú offers a cool experience with its 5 floors filled with diverse content, sound equipment, images, computers, and musical culture. There's even a section dedicated to Herbie. The museum provides an extensive collection of information on the country's history through Image and Sound across its 6 floors. Visitors have found it to be one of the most complete museums they've ever visited.
name: MIS-BC - Museu da Imagem e do Som de Balneário Camboriú
address: R. 700, 44 - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-618, Brazil

detail_description: Beco do Brooklyn - OpenStreetGallery.co is a renowned tourist spot, popular for its vibrant street art and cultural significance. This local hotspot showcases an impressive array of artistic creations that captivate visitors from all walks of life. The place has gained recognition as a top attraction due to its unique blend of urban artistry and local charm. Its open-air gallery concept offers an immersive experience, where tourists can explore the mesmerizing murals and graffiti adorning the walls.
name: Beco do Brooklyn - OpenStreetGallery.co
address: R. 1100 - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-558, Brazil

detail_description: The Taquarinhas viewpoint is an exquisite location that is definitely worth visiting, whether during the day or at night. It is a spot of great beauty and offers breathtaking views. One cannot help but be captivated by its charm and allure. This tourist attraction guarantees an unforgettable experience, leaving no room for disappointment.
name: Lookout Taquarinhas
address: Região das Praias, Balneário Camboriú - SC, Brazil

name: Selfie Experience
address: Av. Alvin Bauer, 100 - Andar Est.01 - Centro, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88330-640, Brazil

detail_description: Casa Linhares is a solid brick house with colonial-style windows, dating back to the 1950s. It holds a collection of old photos and history of Balneario Camboriu and Camboriu. Located in the small Historic Center of Balneario Camboriu, it serves as a support point for the city's artisans and is situated in Praca do Pescador, near various tourist attractions.
name: Casa Linhares
address: R. Emanoel Rebelo dos Santos, 1079 - Barra, Balneário Camboriú - SC, Brazil

name: MULTIPARQUE SC
address: Av. Rodesindo Pavan, 11595 - Praia do Estaleirinho, Balneário Camboriú - SC, 88334-500, Brazil
